Tweets 2007-05-13

May 13, 2007

  • I can’t imagine doing web development without Firebug. http://www.getfirebug.com/ #
  • Blogrolls suck. I haven’t updated mine in years. I don’t even recognize half the blogs I listed. Surely there is a better way to do this? #
  • The Art of Chart – Bringing Wall Street Ideas to the Masses : http://tinyurl.com/ytmm8a #
  • Profilefly.com won’t let you enter a birthday before 1970 when you register. No old folks allowed? #
  • And if that wasn’t bad enough, they list Taiwan as “Province of China” … certainly not going to have many Taiwanese registering … #
  • L337 Katz0rz : http://tinyurl.com/3dv9lf #
  • First time in all my years in Taiwan something was stolen from me. Just a bicycle headlight … but still! #
  • Saffron Brigade as Art Critics : http://tinyurl.com/2qszsm #
